<h2>React Native Project</h2>

<p>This challenge aims to develop a To Do List application - a list of everyday tasks, to create something like a personal agenda.</p>
<p>Its development was based on the Figma screens made available in the first challenge of Rocketseat's ðŸš€ react native module, as shown in the figure below:</p>
